00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/bind_receiver.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::BindReceiver::BindReceiver() :
00027     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028     CommandId(CommandId::BindReceiver),
00029     SequenceNumber::Min)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00042 Smpp::BindReceiver::BindReceiver(
00043         const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber,
00044         const SystemId& systemId,
00045         const Password& password,
00046         const SystemType& systemType,
00047         const InterfaceVersion& interfaceVersion,
00048         const Ton& addrTon,
00049         const Npi& addrNpi,
00050         const AddressRange& addressRange) :
00051     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00052              CommandId(CommandId::BindReceiver),
00053              sequenceNumber),
00054     system_id_(systemId),
00055     password_(password),
00056     system_type_(systemType),
00057     interface_version_(interfaceVersion),
00058     addr_ton_(addrTon),
00059     addr_npi_(addrNpi),
00060     address_range_(addressRange)
00061 {
00062     Header::update_length(system_id_.length() +
00063                            password_.length() +
00064                            system_type_.length() +
00065                            address_range_.length());
00066 }
00067 
00070 Smpp::BindReceiver::BindReceiver(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00071     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00072     CommandId(CommandId::BindReceiver),
00073     1)
00074 {
00075     decode(b);
00076 }
00077 
00078 Smpp::BindReceiver::~BindReceiver()
00079 {
00080 }
00081 
00085 const Smpp::Uint8*
00086 Smpp::BindReceiver::encode()
00087 {
00088     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00089 
00090     Request::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00091     buff_ += system_id_;
00092     buff_ += password_;
00093     buff_ += system_type_;
00094     buff_ += interface_version_;
00095     buff_ += addr_ton_;
00096     buff_ += addr_npi_;
00097     buff_ += address_range_;
00098 
00099     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00100 
00101     return buff_.get();
00102 }
00103 
00107 void
00108 Smpp::BindReceiver::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00109 {
00110     Request::decode(buff);
00111 
00112     Smpp::Uint32 len = Request::command_length();
00113     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00114     const char* err = "Invalid bind PDU length";
00115     if(len < offset)
00116         throw Error(err);
00117 
00118     const Smpp::Char* sptr = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00119 
00120     system_id_ = &sptr[offset];
00121     offset += system_id_.length() + 1;
00122     if(len < offset)
00123         throw Error(err);
00124 
00125     password_ = &sptr[offset];
00126     offset += password_.length() + 1;
00127     if(len < offset)
00128         throw Error(err);
00129 
00130     system_type_ = &sptr[offset];
00131     offset += system_type_.length() + 1;
00132     if(len < offset)
00133         throw Error(err);
00134 
00135     interface_version_ = buff[offset];
00136     ++offset;
00137 
00138     addr_ton_ = buff[offset];
00139     ++offset;
00140 
00141     addr_npi_ = buff[offset];
00142     ++offset;
00143 
00144     address_range_ = &sptr[offset];
00145     offset += address_range_.length() + 1;
00146     if(len < offset)
00147         throw Error(err);
00148 
00149     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00150 }
